featured.text: Following the number-based convention, typhoons are coded with 31 types of numbers such as a 4-digit or a 6-digit code.
It is the two or three digits just before the local number.
Cities and areas with higher populations would have a smaller first and third digit, and 1 as the center digit.

definition.zh_def: 數字，特別是0到9之間的任何一個數字。
definition.en_def: A numeral or figure representing a number, especially any of the ten symbols from 0 to 9.
definition.example: She wrote down the digit '5' on the paper.
